issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
Hi,
I am trying to integrate Localytics into Appcelerator for windows application.
Is there a way I can achieve the same?
I was able to integrate Localytics for Android and iOS. I specifically need to do this for windows phone application.

comments.body: Hello, Can you explain your query a little more. What module are you using for localytics in iOS and Android? We have third party module for localytics in our marketplace for iOS. https://marketplace.appcelerator.com/apps/1845#!overview you can contact the developer for a WIndows module version. Thanks.
